p: In the current research, umbelliferone and pimpinellin were isolated from Zosima absinthfolia, and indicated activity against AChE and BuChE. We assumed that the inhibitory activity of umbelliferone was primary due to the hydroxyl group at the C-7 position. Also, we assumed that the inhibitory activity of pimpinellin was primary due to the methoxy groups at the C-5 and C-6 positions. Umbelliferone and pimpinellin presented the best activity at 20 Âµg/mL, while bergapten indicated weak inhibitory activity.
